live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
30779.summary: Some customers in the Uplands area of Victoria are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
30779.title: Dec 21 – Victoria (Uplands) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
